name: Subject: RBC-Prime
nationality: Unknown (Potentially original OGE team member or earlier)

background.specialization: Advanced/stabilized Residual Bioconstruct. Enforcer/Bodyguard for Silas Vance.
background.ideology: Fundamentally inhuman. Driven by Locus's biological imperative and commands from Vance/Whisperer. Retains intelligence and cunning. Utterly ruthless, patient, silent. Immune to pain/conventional social interaction.
background.incidents: Potentially original OGE team member or someone exposed much earlier to Gate Locus influence.
background.possession: Collects small, metallic objects from victims. Wears durable, somewhat archaic-looking clothing, wide-brimmed hat.
background.description: Tall, unnervingly thin, gaunt features, pronounced cheekbones, deep-set pale eyes that rarely blink. Moves with unnatural stillness or bursts of predatory speed. Silent and watchful. Exudes palpable menace.

damage_resistance.notes: Ignores first 3 points of damage per attack unless CNS hit or incendiary.

infectious_regurgitation.name: Infectious Regurgitation
infectious_regurgitation.effect: On failed CON check, initiate bioconstruction transformation (details TBD).

unnatural_movement.name: Unnatural Movement
unnatural_movement.effect: May gain bonus die on Stealth or Dodge in specific environments, or move faster than expected.

fear_aura.name: Fear Aura
fear_aura.effect: Mental Stability check (0/1D2) upon first close encounter.

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.notes: Recovers 2 HP per combat round unless 'killed' by specific means (e.g., dismemberment, incineration, Locus disruption).
